subject: Re: Trying from this email. TAKE TWO

full_threads.body: Logged 30mins to Harvest

action.text: Chris Paradowski assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Hi Daniel,

Thanks, confirming the footer is now live on both mobile and desktop views.

Please note, there may be delays for some users based on the recent experience with caching.
@ricaV2 Time: +30mins
Hi @chris done, footer is live now please check thanks
Hi @jaime let's push the footer live, thanks!

Hi Chris

The footer looks good to me

Many thanks and let's hope re. 404 errors

Best

Daniel

Hi Team,

Great to know the link issue appears to be resolved. 

Looping back to the below request from Daniel. Here is a quick video that runs through a modern take on the pop-up: https://www.loom.com/share/81ff89f309d34fd4b84c9563dcee80dd

Here is a direct link: https://dontsweatit.com.au/home-draft/ Please be sure to check it out on mobile and desktop views. 

With your approval, we’ll get the new footer live.

Hi @jaime (I did it, I said the famous "last request")

Can I please ask for your help in adding a sticky footer for mobile, tablet and desktop websites?

In short, we'd like to replicate what we have used on: https://smartreviews.com.au/

Let's use: #F2C1C9 as the background colour.
#494949 as the text colour. 
Heading copy: Don't Sweat It Retreat - Hamilton Island
Button colour: same as the on page buttons 'buy now' here: https://dontsweatit.com.au/hamilton-island-retreat/
Button copy: "View the details"
Logged a total of 15mins to Harvest
Please see below re. link used in Instagram to access retreat page
@chris done chris, please check Thanks

Thanks Jaime,

I have received approval from client to go live.

Can I please ask that page: https://dontsweatit.com.au/hamilton-island-retreat/ replace the current https://dontsweatit.com.au/retreats/ page? 

Let's save the old page as a draft, thanks!!

Hi @chris done updating terms and condition, please check thanks

Time: +5mins @ricaV2

Hi Jaime, 

One more update for this one. 

Please update the terms and conditions with the attached. 

Please note, I have highlighted the updates. Please ensure they are uploaded without highlighting etc.

attachments.filename: DSI Retreat terms and Conditions Clean Copy 12012023 1.docx

3. Please update the answer on FAQ "I'm a social media fiend..." -- ✅ DONE
We know you’re a social creature and we love it! Join in on the fun by following @dontsweatitmenopause @shellyhorton1 @drginni on Instagram. Tag us and use #DontSweatItRetreat to share your event experience. We LOVE seeing your social posts (so much that we sometimes even give a prize for them!)

@ricaV2 Time: +10mins

Hi @jaime 

A couple of small updates from the DSI team. Can I please ask you to prio these?

2. Please update the ABN on the invoice to read: 43660392165
3. Please update the answer on FAQ "I'm a social media fiend..."

attachments.filename: DSI Retreat terms and Conditions Clean Copy 12012023 1.docx

action.text: Chris Paradowski assigned to Jaime Velasquez

full_threads.body: Logged 2.5H to Harvest

@ricaV2 can I please ask you to add 2.5 hours for this ticket. 
Creating and updating the checkout process for Hamilton Island Retreat (including registrations and Ts&Cs).

A couple tweaks
Done on my iPad. Is this ok @ Chris?

I'm a social media fiend and want to get in on that #hashtag action at the event, how can I get among it?

I'm a social media fiend

We know you're a social creature and we love it! Join in on the fun by following @dontsweatitmenopause @shellyhorton1 @drginni on Instagram #DontSweatItRetreat to share your event experience. We LOVE seeing your social posts (so much that we sometimes even give a prize for them!

Extend stay

You sure can AND you get it at the conference room rate! Simply contact The Reef View Hotel directly On 1800370800don't But please note full pre-payment for all pre and post accommodation is required thirty (30) days prior to arrival on Hamilton Island and is based upon availability.

Upgrade room

You sure can. Simply contact The Reef View Hotel directly on 1800370800don't and say you are part of the Don't Sweat it Retreat. There is a small price increase.

have a physical ticket; how will I get in?

I don't have a physical ticket

We prefer to save trees and have not printed tickets for our events. Instead, pop on by our registration desk when you arrive at the event and grab your name badge. This will give you entry to the event.

Taxman q

When you purchase your event ticket, you will receive a confirmation email and a tax invoice .

Partner

We offer a range of opportunities to support and partner with us. You can get in touch with us on info@dontsweatit.com.au to find out what is possible.

Here's an example of how another retreat does it

https://events.businesschicks.com/booking.php?key1=K09qbVFGQzU4Q1hXZXBYN2VzZW5JUT09

Shelly Horton

0404 868 463

https://shellshockedmedia.com/

One other thing I forgot to add in the brief...

When a customer selects Buddy price they must list the details of the second person otherwise we won't know who is rooming together and who is owing money.

Please add this to the title

Sharing a Room with a Buddy Ticket $2,200 pp inc. GST

Then list their own details and the buddy's details

Can we please add another FAQ at the top?

How much does it cost?
The retreat is $2500 +GST for your own room.
Or $2000 +GST per person ($4000 +GST total) if you share a room with a buddy.
You can pay in full now. Or pay a 50% deposit now and then pay the remainder on May 30, 2023.
Check out our T&Cs.

Thanks

Shelly x

I LOVE IT!!!!!

Looks amazing.

It worked a treat for me. No problems at all.

Quick questions:

1. Please also make mobile friendly
2. Will it replace the Retreat page or be a drop down menu? If so can you please send me the exact link to add to the newsletter?
3. Where will the T&Cs go?
4. Can we make the reply email have a more obvious INVOICE/RECEIPT title at the bottom?
5. Is there a reason it doesn't separate GST? I thought the form I sent you had it separate?

That's it from me.

Well done. Thanks for your speediness on this.

Shelly x

Shelly Horton

0404 868 463

https://shellshockedmedia.com/

Hi Shelly,

Great news, we have the retreats page and checkout flow ready for your review. Please note, there are some look and feel elements on the form we are still polishing and we expect to complete these tomorrow. 

You can take it for a test drive here: https://dontsweatit.com.au/hamilton-island-retreat/

You can also test the cart function from start to finish. Simply use your preferred alias along with the following payment details:

Card: 4242 4242 4242 4242
Exp: 04/24
CCV: 123

Please review and let us know what you love, and what you'd like to see tweaked!
